details.htmlRules:
The “Drops & Wins” Daily Tournaments and Daily Prize Drops are active in this game and run from the 6th of March 2024 to 5th of March 2025 on a daily basis (the “Network Promotion Term”). By participating in the Network Promotion (as defined below), the player hereby agrees to abide by these terms and conditions. 

WIN UP TO 2500x of the bet value with no minimum bet requirement in the Daily Prize Drops! On top of that, climb the daily leaderboard and win more in our Daily Tournaments! 

• Win up to 2500x of the bet! 

• Expected daily prize pool: ~weeklyPool 

• 6500 daily cash prizes up for grabs 

• Runs 7 days a week 

• It only takes a spin to win! 

• Any stake bet value qualifies for the Network Promotion 

• Newly introduced Instant Bonus prizes 

How to participate in a Daily Prize Drop: 

1. A player must join/opt-in to any of the participating games.  

2. A player must spin at least one (1) real money spin with any bet amount/stake on any of the participating games.  

3. Any qualifying bet placed on any of the participating games may trigger one (1) random prize from the prize pool during a Daily Prize Drop period.  

4. A player may win multiple Daily Prize Drops during each day of the Network Promotion.  

Daily Prize Drops – Prize Table 

Quantity     Prize 

1               2500X 
2               1000X 
5               500X 
12             200X 
20             100X 
70             50X 
160           20X 
580           10X 
500           10 Free Spins Bonus 
5100          5 Free Spins Bonus 
50             1 Instant Bonus 

Prize calculation for Daily Prize Drops:  

• The winning spin bet size will determine the final cash value of the winning multiplier prize.  

• The prize will be calculated accordingly: (winning spin bet amount x multiplier won). 

• If the winning bet size in the winning spin exceeds ~maxBet, the prize will be paid out based on a bet of ~maxBet (or the equivalent amount in available currencies) X multiplier won. 

General terms and conditions – Daily Tournaments and Daily Prize Drops:  

• Pragmatic Play’s “Drops & Wins” promotion (the “Network Promotion”) consists of three hundred and sixty-four (364) daily tournaments (each a “Daily Tournament”) and a total of three hundred and sixty-four (364) daily prize drops (each a “Daily Prize Drop”) which will run weekly throughout the Network Promotion Term. 

• In order to participate in any Daily Tournament or Daily Prize Drop in the Network Promotion, a player must join/opt in any of the participating games.  

• In order to be eligible to participate in the Network Promotion, a player will be required to play a real money spin under the following conditions (hereinafter a “Qualifying Bet”): 

• In order to be eligible to participate in the Daily Prize Drops, a player shall be required to play a real money spin with any bet amount/stake. 

• All spins with a minimum bet of ~requiredBet (or the equivalent amount in available currencies*) in the participating games will be considered eligible for the Daily Tournaments. 

• If the minimum bet amount is unavailable, the minimum bet shall be rounded up to the next higher available bet size in the game.   

*Example for illustrative purposes only  

€/£ 0.50 = 2,5 PLN, 5 NOK, 265 AMD...   

€/£ 1 = 5 PLN, 10 NOK, 530 AMD ...   

• A Qualifying Bet shall render a player eligible for all applicable “Drops & Wins” Daily Tournaments and Daily Prize Drops promotions simultaneously, according to the mechanics described below: 

Daily Prize Drops mechanics 

• The Network Promotion includes three hundred and sixty-four (364) Daily Prize Drops (each a “Daily Prize Drop Day”). 

• One (1) Qualifying Bet may trigger one (1) prize from the prize pool during each promotion. 

• The Daily Prize Drops rules and prize tables are built in the participating games. The Prize Drops prize table updates in real time displaying the current standingsas well as the number of prizes left. 

• The Daily Prize Drop will end daily upon the earlier of: (i) 18:59 CEST/CET or (ii) when there are no more prizes left. 

Daily Tournaments mechanics: 

• In order to be eligible to participate in a Daily Tournament, a player is required to play at least one Qualifying Bet on any of the participating games. 

• Only the first five thousand (5,000) Qualifying Bets per day within each Daily Tournament (the “Qualifying Bets Limit”) will be considered as eligible for each Promotion. All Qualifying Bets placed after reaching the Qualifying Bets Limit will not be counted towards each Promotion. 

• Prizes will be distributed to winners according to their final position in the leaderboard, when each Daily Tournament ends, in descending order from highest to lowest position depending on the player’s total score. 

• The positions in the leaderboard ranked in accordance with the player’s score. The score is based on the total amount of points accumulated on any participating game as a total sum of all wins multiplier in relation to their bet amount during a Daily Tournament period. 

Score calculation example for illustrative purposes only: 

Score = ((Win*USD conversion)/(bet*USD conversion)) 

Player places a bet of €1 and wins €50 => Score = ((€50 * 1.08) / (€1 * 1.08)) = 50 

Player places a bet of €5 and wins €1,000 => Score = ((€1000 * 1.08) / (€5 * 1.08)) = 200 

Player final score will be 200 + 50 = 250 

• The leaderboard is updated in real-time, and players can view the leaderboard, in real-time and in-game at any time of their own choosing when playing the participating games. 

• In the event that two (2) or more players finish a Daily Tournament on the same position on the leaderboard, the player who has achieved the score first, will receive the higher prize. 

• Prizes are paid out to players as a fixed cash amount. 

Other General Terms and Conditions: 

• There is no additional cost to participate in the Network Promotion. 

• Expected monthly prize pool: ~monthlyPool in cash. 

• For the avoidance of doubt, any undistributed portion of the prize pool at the end of any specific Daily Tournament and/or Daily Prize Drop shall be carried forward into subsequent stages or into the next Network Promotion. 

• Prizes will be paid out as per the ‘Prizes’ tab in the participating games or in the table above these Terms and Conditions.  

• All amounts are displayed in-game in the Player's Currency (where "Player's Currency" means the currency of the territory in which the player is located).  

• Prizes in a Daily Tournament may be won by players in the form of fixed cash amount as set out in the Daily Tournament Prize Table. Prizes in a Daily Prize Drop may be won by players in the form of a multiplier amount, Instant Bonus and/or Free Spins Bonus (as defined below), as set out in the Daily Prize Drops Prize Table. 

• If the winning spin exceeds one ~maxBet, the prize will be paid out based on a bet of ~maxBet or the equivalent amount in the available currencies X multiplier received.  

• Free spins bonuses (the “Free Spins Bonus/es”) may be awarded to a player in the form of ten (10) and/or five (5) Free Spins Bonuses for the same participating game in which the player won the prize. 

• Instant bonuses (the “Instant Bonus/es”) may be awarded to a player for a selected participating game* for the same bet as the winning bet.  

• The Free Spins Bonuses and Instant Bonus winnings have no wagering requirements once awarded to the player.  

• If the bet amount in the Free Spins Bonus and or Instant Bonus winning spin exceeds ~maxbet or the equivalent amount in the available currencies, the Free Spins Bonus and/or Instant Bonus will be paid out based on a bet of ~maxBet or the equivalent amount in the available currencies.   

• If the participating game does not have ~maxBet bet available, the Free Spins Bonus and/or Instant Bonus will be paid out at the next available higher bet in the participating game.   

• The Free Spins Bonus and/or Instant Bonus prizes won in a Daily Prize Drop will be awarded to winners on the same day that the Free Spins Bonus and/or Instant Bonus have been won. 

• The Free Spins Bonus and/or Instant Bonus prizes will be valid for seven (7) days from the time they have been awarded to the player. The Free Spins Bonus and/or Instant Bonus will expire if not utilised within 7 days from being awarded to the player.  

*Pragmatic Play reserves the right, in its sole and absolute discretion to select and change the game where the Instant Bonus prizes will be awarded to players every four (4) weeks.  

• The Daily Prize Drops and Daily Tournament rules are built-in the participating games. 

• All prizes won during the Network Promotion Term must be paid out as a fixed cash amount prizes with no wagering requirements. 

• Pragmatic Play reserves the right to amend, suspend or cancel the Network Promotion, Daily Tournament and/or Daily Prize Drop, including any related terms and conditions, at any time. Any such amendment will not affect players that have opted-in unless the amendment is required to manage/prevent fraud and other unlawful behaviour.
